DOC.brief_summary: The project aim develop , implement evaluate electronically-mediated behavioral intervention program pregnant postpartum woman order prevent excessive weight gain pregnancy postpartum weight retention .
DOC.detailed_description: This study seek expand understand slow accumulation weight childbearing woman . The intervention goal decrease prevalence excessive pregnancy weight gain mean weight retention first 18 month postpartum socio-economically racially/ethnically diverse sample 1,641 pregnant woman . Women randomly assign one three group : Intervention Group 1 receive intervention program pregnancy ( e-intervention 1 ) . Intervention Group 2 receive e-intervention 1 plus intervention 18 month postpartum ( e-intervention 2 ) . Control woman receive non-weight related content time period project website . The primary hypothesis randomize controlled trial : H1 : The proportion woman Intervention Groups 1 2 gain weight pregnancy recommend IOM 33 % less proportion woman Control Group gain excessively H2 : The Control Group high mean weight retention 12 month postpartum Intervention Groups 1 2 .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 35 time delivery Consented 20 week gestation Intending available 24 month intervention Plan deliver one 4 hospital Rochester , NY ( study area ) Plan carry pregnancy term Plan keep baby Read understand English BMI < 18.5 kg/m2 > 35.0 kg/m2 . Multiple gestation . If multiple gestation diagnose enrollment participant terminate study ( reason termination include consent form ) Medical condition prior pregnancy could influence weight loss gain : cystic fibrosis , hyperthyroidism , renal insufficiency1 , proteinuria1 , cerebral palsy , lupus erythematosus ; rheumatoid arthritis , Crohns disease ( severity autoimmune disease evaluate case case ) , ulcerative colitis , maternal congenital heart disease ( patient often underweight ) ; hypertension treat medication2 , Psychiatric medication associate major weight gain loss ( e.g . ; Lithium & Divalproex ) Common Criteria Household member study staff Past plan ( within next 24 month ) weight loss surgery ( e.g . gastric bypass , lap band , liposuction ) ; current participation commercial weight loss program ( e.g . Weight Watcher 's , Jenny Craig ) ; currently enrol plan enroll weight loss another weight gain prevention study Participants exclude screen report regular use systemic steroid , prescription weight loss drug , and/or diabetes medication ( oral inject insulin , metformin , byetta , TZDs , ) . `` Regular use '' define `` take medication day week previous month '' Current treatment eat disorder Positive screening bulimia Weight loss 15 pound three month prior pregnancy Cardiovascular event ( heart attack , stroke , episode heart failure , revascularization procedure ) within last 6 month . Revascularization define bypass surgery stint Mental psychiatric condition precludes give informed consent complete questionnaire Current treatment malignancy ( nonmelanoma skin cancer CIN cervix ) remission le 5 year Blood pressure criterion
